newsitem.title: FINLAND: Raisio plans Benecol update on Oct 24.
newsitem.headline: Raisio plans Benecol update on Oct 24.

text.p: Finnish food, animal feeds and chemicals group Raision Tehtaat Oy said on Tuesday it would give a presentation on its cholesterol-reducing margarine Benecol on October 24 at 1230/0930 GMT.
"We will talk about our plans concerning Benecol," Raisio spokesman Jarkko Heino told Reuters. Presentations will be given in Helsinki and London.
